about.title: About
about.text: Hello, I am Marcos, i´m from Brazil, and i´m a front-end software engineer. I'm 27 years old. I consider myself a dynamic and of easy relationship interpersonal, capable of a team job and fast learn, and job dedicated.
about.sub-text: I like movies, musics and i play guittar, like soccer too, and love build new things.

projects.title: Website of ticket printing
projects.description: This is a project that I developed together with my co-workers, where it is possible for a client to access the site, and informing their contract data or CPF, issues their bill for the month.

projects.title: Web GM
projects.description: WebGM is a system that I developed together with my co-workers, it is a system intended for internal use by employees of the company, with it it is possible for each employee to log in and access their environment of work.

projects.title: Notation
